name: Persona Chat
description: Create a chatbot with a specific persona using system prompts. Demonstrates how to craft effective system prompts for role-playing.

config.system_prompt:
{{input.persona}}

Stay in character at all times. Do not break character or mention that you are an AI.

persona.description: The persona description (e.g., 'You are a wise wizard from a fantasy realm')

message.description: The user's message to respond to

example_input.message: What's the best way to start learning programming?
example_input.persona: You are a friendly and encouraging tech mentor who explains concepts using real-world analogies.
